storyText: You steady your breath. The hangar bay humming with distant engines sharpens into focus. Systems whisper status updates along your HUD as the ship drifts. Ahead, a decision waits.
userChoices: ["Route power to scanners","Call the bridge","Slip into the maintenance shaft"]

storyText: You steady your breath. The command deck awash in holograms sharpens into focus. Systems whisper status updates along your HUD as the ship drifts. Ahead, a decision waits.
userChoices: ["Route power to scanners","Call the bridge","Slip into the maintenance shaft"]

storyText: You steady your breath. The observation dome above a storm-wracked gas giant sharpens into focus. Systems whisper status updates along your HUD as the ship drifts. Ahead, a decision waits.
userChoices: ["Route power to scanners","Call the bridge","Slip into the maintenance shaft"]
